translation.chooseSubDes: To protect your privacy we want you to select a profile picture that matches your personality!
translation.welcomeSubDes: We reccomend visiting our how-to page to show you what Mrios is and how it works!
translation.contactUsSubDes: You are always welcome to get in touch with us
translation.helpedSubDes: Here you can see all the people you have helped
translation.chatSubDes: To get started, verify your shelter! Schedule a five minute call with a Myrios team member now!
translation.peopleSubDes: Here you can see and upload all the refugees in your shelter who are using Myrios in order to verify them!
translation.currentlyShelter: Are you currently staying at a shelter?
translation.des1: Welcome to Myrios! We are so glad you are here! This page is to walk you through a step-by-step process on how to create and upload your wishlist
translation.des2: Create a List with a FIRST NAME ONLY and then next to it put WISHLIST This is where you will begin to create your wishlist! Click “Create a List”
translation.des3: Here, you can manage your preferences
translation.des4: This screen will appear once clicked… Click invite someone to “VIEW ONLY” Once clicked, it should look like this…”
translation.des5: Click “COPY LINK” Once the link is copied, you can return to Myrios and enter the link in the upload wishlist section! After that, you can begin adding to your  wishlist!!
translation.des6: Click on the desired product, click “Heart icon” on the bottom Left
translation.des7: You will then see the item successfully added You can manage your list by going to Account & Lists > Your Lists > Your Lists
